subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Mikhail Youzhny rallied past the big-serving wild card Daniel Brands, 3-6, 6-3, 6-4, to reach the final of the BMW Open in Munich.
snippet: Mikhail Youzhny rallied past the big-serving wild card Daniel Brands, 3-6, 6-3, 6-4, to reach the final of the BMW Open in Munich.
